inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: chronic HCV infection with Plasma HCV RNA greater than 15,000 IU/mL

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Absence of coinfection with HBV or HIV

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient is a 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and the recent coinfection with HBV.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His BP: 130/75, HR: 90/min and BMI: 27. His abdomen is soft with no ascites or tenderness.
